'''Quicksand Treasure Hunter (I)''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open a total of 120 treasure [[chest]]s in [[Hypostyle Desert]], [[Land of Upper Setekh]], and [[Land of Lower Setekh]].
